article_title: New York City Mayor de Blasio Talks Security, Ebola in Washington
article_text:
WASHINGTON—New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, a left-leaning Democrat who has faced criticism on public-safety issues, was in the nation’s capital Tuesday for meetings with federal officials on the threat of terrorism and the Ebola outbreak.

Mr. de Blasio and New York City police Commissioner Bill Bratton met with Lisa Monaco, assistant to President Barack Obama for homeland security and counterterrorism, in the White House...
